# James Stewart (Liberal politician)

James Stewart (18 June 1827 â€“ 28 May 1895) was a Scottish businessman Scottish Liberal Party politician, elected as a member of parliament for Greenock in 1878, resigning in 1884 to become Steward of the Manor of Northstead.
Stewart was a shipowner and foreign merchant, and owned estates in Scotland.
